description: '''Thai rock''' ({{langx|th|ไทยร็อก}}) is [[rock music]] from [[Thailand]]. Thai rock was influenced by rock bands from the United States and United Kingdom. Emerging in the 1980s it flourished with bands like [[Asanee–Wasan]], [[Carabao (band)|Carabao]] and [[Micro (Thai band)|Micro]]. It became widely popular in the 1990s.
